name: coronation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a ceremony at which a person is made king or queen: He was present at the coronation of Queen Victoria. Compare
investiture formal
usually disapproving an occasion when someone is chosen for an important job without having to win an election or other competition: If nobody else stands against him this won't be a vote, it will be a coronation.
More examplesFewer examplesThe inscription commemorates George III's coronation in 1809. My grandmother remembers the Coronation in 1954.This is not a coronation; he has to earn this position.We believe that a coronation that excludes party members from having a say will be inconsistent with the proud democratic traditions of our party.
